projects.title: World of Orchids
projects.caption: Landing Page
projects.description: This is an information site for a fictional non-profit organization inspired by the American Orchid Society. Built with HTML, CSS and JS, it features responsive design and scroll-reveal.js.

projects.title: L'Mau
projects.caption: E-commerce site
projects.description: This is a full stack e-commerce shopping site created with React, REST API architecture, data management with mongoose and MongoDB, state management with Redux. Styled with MDN Bootstrap and hosted on Heroku.

projects.title: Lights Out
projects.caption: Puzzle Game
projects.description: This is a Lights Out inspired clone, a puzzle game consisting of a 5 by 5 grid of lights. Clicking the lights toggles itself and its adjacent lights. The goal of the game is to switch all of the lights off. Can you solve it? Created with React, neon flux css animation from a codepen by Thomas Trinca.

projects.title: iFlix
projects.caption: Movie API
projects.description: This is a full stack movie web application using server-side REST API architecture with Node/Express, data management with mongoose and MongoDB Atlas, client-side interface with REACT, styled with React Bootstrap. {testUser: cat, password: cat}

projects.title: D'Accord
projects.caption: Chat Application
projects.description: A Discord inspired app, D'Accord is a chat application created with Express, Node and Socket.io. It features real-time, bidirectional and event-based communication between the browser and the server with chatroom options. Happy Chatting!

projects.title: Folia
projects.caption: Online PLant Shop
projects.description: As a plant enthusiast and a love for all things green, I created this full stack MERN e-commerce site to satiate my plant addiction (temporarily). It features login authentication, user/order/product management and also payment methods with PayPal via Stripe. You can now buy ALL the plants because one can never have enough. Leaf and let live.

projects.title: Meetup
projects.caption: Progressive Web App
projects.description: This serverless, progressive web app is built with React, implementing test driven development. I use AWS Lambda as the serverless compute service as well as the MeetupAPI to fetch upcoming events for a selected city.

projects.title: eatMe Recipes
projects.caption: Recipe Search App
projects.description: I love to eat AND I love to cook. This recipe app makes it easy to find recipes for creating the perfect meals. Built with vanilla javascript, I use the Edamam API to fetch recipe data via axios. Hungry? Let's cook!
